EmailTemplate.description: Get's sent when the VCI passes 10 VL Prescreens
EmailTemplate.name: VL Graduation
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations, you are a certified Virtual Lift user
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You've gone through the prescreen process and completed 10 Virtual Lift reports successfully. Moving forward, your images no longer required pre-screening review and will be uploaded with your condition reports. We will periodically audit your images and consistent quality will be key in remaining certified for virtual lift image uploads.
